data: Young Lyon, lounging in the Court House to make up his daily tale of items for the Waynscott News, was perhaps the only man who knew exactly how the quarrel between Lawrence and Fullerton began, though, when later events had made that quarrel take on an unexpected significance, he was exactly the one man who did not talk about it.

Young Lyon, lounging in the Court House to make up his daily tale of items for the Waynscott _News_, was perhaps the only man who knew exactly how the quarrel between Lawrence and Fullerton began, though, when later events had made that quarrel take on an unexpected significance, he was exactly the one man who did not talk about it.
Long, Lily A. (Lily Augusta), 1862-1927; Grunwald, Charles, 1867-1910 [Illustrator]
